subject: p14387068
History: -year-old man with hepatic hydrothorax status post TIPS procedure and chest tube.
Findings: Comparison is made to the prior study from at 3:20 am. There is again seen a very large right-sided hydropneumothorax. There is collapse of the right lung. A right basilar pleural catheter is again seen on the edge of the film. There has been decrease in the size of the pleural effusion density on the right however, this may be partially due to positioning.
